Cysharp/MemoryPack

Zero-encoding binary serializer for C# and Unity

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • JSON and binary serialization for C++ objects, with simple interfaces for reading and writing data
  • OpenSERDES is an open-source digital Serializer/Deserializer using Skywater 130nm PDK for converting parallel data to high-speed serial data and back
  • Zero-overhead CLI framework using C# source generators
  • Persistent memory for AI agents
  • Builds knowledge through conversations with LLMs
  • Google’s data serialization format for structured data
  • Original Microsoft BASIC source code for 6502 microcomputers from the 1970s
  • Universal serial interface for hardware hacking
  • Library for encoding and decoding CBOR and CBOR Sequences
